Security policy

Source: SECURITY.md

Reporting a vulnerability

If you believe you have found a security vulnerability, please report it privately by emailing maintainer@example.com. We will acknowledge your report within 72 hours and work with you on a resolution.

Supported versions

We support the latest release of the package. Security fixes will be applied to new releases as needed.
